data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Sangli that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sangli, Maharashtra, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, help the 11,367 believers in Sangli to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 11,367 believers in Sangli, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Sangli, Maharashtra, India know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Bandi (Hindu traditions) people.
Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Sangli, Maharashtra, India.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Sangli, Maharashtra, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Sangli.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

location.name: Sangli
location.people_groups_list: Bhavit, Bania Oswal, Patharwat, Beldar Katani Uppara, Bhansala
